title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.16 - Human excreta
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.16 - Human excreta

State Regulations

No privy or other place for the deposit or storage of
human excreta shall be constructed, located or maintained on any of the lands
embraced within the area of the reservoir. No human excreta shall be placed, left or stored on said reservoir area. No installation of any sewage disposal
plant shall be made without the approval of the board and the State Department
of Health, and shall not be put into use until the finished work has been
accepted and the use permitted by the board and the State Department of

Environmental Conservation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
